id: ประวัติการลา My Leave History_Select_leave_requests1

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT
  *
FROM
  leave_requests
WHERE
  employee_name LIKE '%{{Table_History.searchText}}%'
ORDER BY
  {{Table_History.sortOrder.column || 'id'}} {{Table_History.sortOrder.order !== "desc" ? "" : "DESC"}}
LIMIT
  {{Table_History.pageSize}}
OFFSET
  {{Table_History.pageOffset}}

unpublishedAction.name: Select_leave_requests1
unpublishedAction.pageId: ประวัติการลา My Leave History
